events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their car on the highway, requesting to file a claim immediately due to significant damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report for keywords such as collision and vehicle.
An agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to the case to manage the process moving forward and assist the customer.
The claim has been formally acknowledged and the customer was informed that their submission is under review.
The agent requested additional documents including photos of the damage, police report, and the accident statement for further assessment.
The customer submitted all requested documents on time, including detailed images of the damaged vehicle and the official police report.
Our investigation team commenced a thorough analysis of the accident circumstances based on submitted evidence and third-party statements.
The investigation concluded confirming the accident details provided matched the evidence and established liability accordingly.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the assessed vehicle damages and coverage terms of their policy.
The customer responded positively, agreeing to the proposed settlement and expressing gratitude for the timely handling of the claim.
Following customer consent, the claim was officially approved for payment processing in line with the agreed settlement figure.
The approved payment was successfully issued to the customer's designated account to cover their vehicle repair expenses.
The claim has been closed after full payment was made and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
The case files and documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference.
